meta.name: Firebuds
meta.description: Set in a fantastical world where talking vehicles live, work and play with the humans who drive them, Firebuds follows a boy named Bo and his fire engine best friend Flash as they team up with their first responder friends to help others in their community with problems big and small.

videos.title: Car in a Tree
videos.overview: The Firebuds must save Piston after he gets stuck in a tree.

videos.title: Dalmatian Day
videos.overview: The Firebuds have to round up four loose Dalmatian puppies at the fire station open house.

videos.title: Hubcap Heist
videos.overview: Bo and the Firebuds must stop a pair of wily art thieves.

videos.title: Food Truck Fiasco
videos.overview: The Firebuds help Fernando the Food Truck get to his caf√© in time for the lunch rush.

videos.title: Treehouse Trouble
videos.overview: The Firebuds work together to build a backyard treehouse

videos.title: The Getaway Car That Got Away
videos.overview: The Firebuds track down a getaway car that they accidentally helped get away.

videos.title: Picnic Pile-Up
videos.overview: Violet and Axl's picnic with their families get interrupted by a surprise emergency.

videos.title: Duo Dash
videos.overview: Axl is nervous about doing well in her school's Duo Dash Speed Race.

videos.title: The Not-So Haunted House
videos.overview: The Firebuds host a not-so-haunted house for little cars, but Iggy and Rod crash the party.

videos.title: Halloween Heroes
videos.overview: The Firebuds stop a Halloween candy bandit.

videos.title: Sleepover Stakeout
videos.overview: Jayden plans a sleepover stakeout to catch the thief of his new invention.

videos.title: Rescue Club
videos.overview: Carly wants to join the school's Rescue Club, even though she's not a rescue vehicle like the Firebuds.

videos.title: Cliffhanger
videos.overview: The Firebuds must rescue Iggy and Rod after their recklessness lands them on the narrow ledge of a cliff.

videos.title: The Very First Fire
videos.overview: Bo and the Firebuds take on their very first fire at the park playground.

videos.title: Marsh Mayhem
videos.overview: Kid reporter, June, gets famous at school after reporting a sighting of an urban legend.

videos.title: The Art of Friendship
videos.overview: The Firebuds create a giant mobile to cheer up kids in the hospital.

videos.title: Lights Out
videos.overview: The Firebuds rally their community to exchange emergency supplies during a blackout.

videos.title: Handle with Car
videos.overview: The Firebuds help relocate fragile lizard eggs to a preserve.

videos.title: Transmission Impossible
videos.overview: When Gearbox Grove's 100th Van-iversity cake is stolen by Wayne and Wiley Riley, the Firebuds must rescue it.

videos.title: Carkour
videos.overview: Piston tries to learn carkour to impress his hero.

videos.title: Care-A-Van Club
videos.overview: Violet meets her hero and tries to rescue his kitten.

videos.title: Mud About You
videos.overview: Bo and Flash go out and look for rescues after a storm lifts.

videos.title: River Rescue
videos.overview: Bo fails to watch a young wee-hicle, and they both end up stuck on a raft in the creek.

videos.title: Big Tread
videos.overview: Piston must overcome his fears of mythical monster trucks to save his lost friends.

videos.title: Hanukkah Hullabaloo
videos.overview: Bo decides to decorate his house to celebrate Hanukkah, but things get out of control.

videos.title: The Christmas Car-Sled Race
videos.overview: Bo wants to win the annual Christmas car-sled race after seeing his dad admire the prize.

videos.title: Call of the Siren
videos.overview: When Axl uses her siren to part traffic for non-emergencies, she struggles to get the other cars on the road to trust her judgment.

videos.title: Jamal's Jam
videos.overview: Jayden joins his dad at work.

videos.title: Bayani Cookout
videos.overview: Bo discovers he has more in common with Grandpa Lolo Ben than he thought.

videos.title: Rest of the Best
videos.overview: After staying up all night, Bo and Flash botch an attempt to rescue Coach D.

videos.title: Piston's Driving School
videos.overview: Piston gives driving lessons to three wild wee-hicles.

videos.title: Jazzyland
videos.overview: Jayden struggles to play pretend with his imaginative little sister and the Firebuds.

videos.title: Puppy Pursuit
videos.overview: Bo forgets to feed his puppy, which causes the hungry pup to travel to the local dog bone factory, where he gets caught.

videos.title: The Ice Cream Truck Bandits
videos.overview: Wayne and Wiley go on an ice cream truck robbing spree.

videos.title: Cleft Hood
videos.overview: Axl takes it upon herself to track a wee-hicle down and convince him to return to the hospital for his cleft hood surgery.

videos.title: The Case of the Disappearing Doghouse
videos.overview: The Buds discover who is stealing the doghouses around town.

videos.title: All That Jazzy
videos.overview: After watching a dance performance, Jazzy vows to prove she is ready to be a lead dancer.

videos.title: Iguana Hold Your Hand
videos.overview: Piston loves all animals until he meets Pow's pet iguana, Bessie.

videos.title: Shelter Island
videos.overview: When a flood hits Gearbox Grove, the Firebuds join Food First Responders Chef Al and Chef Pavani and Duke the Duckbus on their mission to deliver meals to evacuees at the town recreation center.

videos.title: Escape from Shelter Island
videos.overview: As water levels rise at the shelter, the Firebuds must find a way for the evacuees to escape.

videos.title: The Super Safety Show
videos.overview: Iggy and Rod's jealousy of the Firebuds leads to an emergency.

videos.title: Job-O-Rama Day
videos.overview: Violet can't decide which of her moms' jobs to present at a school event.

videos.title: Star Vehicle
videos.overview: The Firebuds are putting on a school play and recycling truck Smush wants to play the starring role.

videos.title: Firebuds Fever
videos.overview: Sick at home with a cold, Jayden must help the Firebuds with a rescue.

videos.title: The Birthday Blaze
videos.overview: Flash goes to extreme lengths to get Bo the best birthday gift ever.

videos.title: Everybody Loves Axl
videos.overview: After a clip of Axl makes her popular online, the Firebuds find that her showboating gets in the way of their rescues.

videos.title: The Four Door Troubadours
videos.overview: The Firebuds help a pair of traveling musicians put on a benefit concert.

videos.title: Moto-Polo
videos.overview: Flash becomes captain of the school's Moto-Polo team and learns what it takes to be a great leader.

videos.title: Roller Coaster Rescue
videos.overview: The Buds pull off a desperate rescue.

videos.title: The Night Shift
videos.overview: The gang get together for a sleepover at the HQ.

videos.title: Hello, Halo!
videos.overview: The Firebuds invite the new kid-helicopter in town for a day of rescue drills.

videos.title: What's Up, Woodpecker?
videos.overview: The Firebuds hike through the woods in search of a rare woodpecker and save its habitat.

videos.title: Sugar Crash
videos.overview: The Firebuds must stop a candy factory heist.

videos.title: The Cut N' Chrome Caper
videos.overview: The Firebuds must team up with Iggy and Rod to catch a thief at the Cut N' Chrome shop.

videos.title: Mayhem at the Museum
videos.overview: Wiley Riley crashes the Firebuds' science museum sleepover to steal a rare meteorite.

videos.title: Wrong Way Rescue
videos.overview: The Firebuds must save a young car stuck in reverse.

videos.title: Apple Pie Peril
videos.overview: The Firebuds help Chef Pavani make an apple pie for her harvest festival.

videos.title: Hike & Seek
videos.overview: While on a nature drive, the Firebuds must rescue a young car who gets lost in the woods during a storm.

videos.title: Blizzard Buds
videos.overview: The Firebuds brave a blizzard to reunite a family for Christmas.

videos.title: Parade Escapade
videos.overview: The Firebuds take part in the Motopolis New Year's Day parade.

videos.title: Annie Spokely
videos.overview: The Firebuds get a rescue call from an old western town.

videos.title: Ingrid on Ice
videos.overview: The Firebuds help a kid ice cream truck make friends at the skating pond.

videos.title: Science Fair Snafu
videos.overview: Wayne disguises himself as a science fair judge and tricks Jayden into making him an invention.

videos.title: The Scavenger Hunt
videos.overview: The Firebuds take part in a first responder scavenger hunt.

videos.title: Balancing Act
videos.overview: Violet tries to impress her visiting birth mum, a circus acrobat.

videos.title: Monster Truck Piston
videos.overview: Piston gets new monster truck tires and helps the Firebuds stop a theft.

videos.title: Skitty Kitty
videos.overview: Violet must care for a mischievous cat while the Firebuds track down thieves at a flea market.

videos.title: Heat Wave
videos.overview: The Firebuds visit a desert roadside attraction on an extremely hot day.

videos.title: Wayne's Trains and Automobiles
videos.overview: The Firebuds rescue a train after Wayne tries to steal the train's cargo.

videos.title: Jazzy Buds
videos.overview: Jazzy forms her own rescue team called "Jazzy-Buds."

videos.title: The Drive Along
videos.overview: The Firebuds join Axl's "trambulance" dad on a ride along.

videos.title: Rescue Club Rangers
videos.overview: The Firebuds try to earn Rescue Club badges by completing a forest rescue course.

videos.title: Fire Tower Frenzy
videos.overview: The Firebuds visit a mountaintop fire tower to help look out for forest fires.

videos.title: What's Cookin'
videos.overview: Flash teams up with Chef Fernando and Chef Al in a bake-and-race competition for charity.

videos.title: Woodland Wiley
videos.overview: The Firebuds take back a mirror Wiley steals while learning outdoor skills in the woods.

videos.title: P.I. Piston
videos.overview: Piston solves the mystery of the disappearing instruments during music class.

videos.title: Mayor for the Day
videos.overview: Piston wins a chance to be mayor for the day but gets carried away making Gearbox Grove the safest town ever.

videos.title: Dozer Disaster
videos.overview: The Firebuds try to save a grove of trees from being bulldozed.

videos.title: Haywire Halo
videos.overview: The Firebuds perform their first aerial rescue during a mountain hike.

videos.title: Smorgasburger
videos.overview: Flash wants to open a booster shake stand at a food truck festival.
